name: Space Guns (LiWorDev)
description:
You are a brave space warrior sent on a dangerous mission. Fight against invaders and upgrade your spaceship to save your race. You have to gain more money to make yourself stronger and defeat all enemies.

If you like graphics, sounds and music check links below:

Graphics by Gustavo Vituri: https://gvituri.itch.io/ 

  • SPACES SHOOTER ASSET PACK: https://gvituri.itch.io/space-shooter

Sounds by GroovyMaster: https://groovymaster.itch.io/

  • GROOVY'S 50 RETRO SOUND EFFECTS PACKEGE:https://groovymaster.itch.io/groovys-50-retro-sound-effects-package

Music by Goose Ninja: https://gooseninja.itch.io/

  • SPACES MUSIC PACK: https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack
